Module org.microbean.loader
Package org.microbean.loader

Class EnvironmentVariableProvider

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.loader.spi.AbstractProvider
org.microbean.loader.EnvironmentVariableProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider
public final class EnvironmentVariableProvider extends AbstractProvider
An AbstractProvider that provides access to environment variables.
Author:
Laird Nelson

    final Value<?>
    get(Loader<?> requestor, Path<? extends Type> absolutePath)
    If the supplied absolutePath has a size of 2 (the root plus a single name), returns a deterministic Value whose Value.get() method returns the environment variable with that name, or null in all other cases.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public final Value<?> get(Loader<?> requestor, Path<? extends Type> absolutePath)
      If the supplied absolutePath has a size of 2 (the root plus a single name), returns a deterministic Value whose Value.get() method returns the environment variable with that name, or null in all other cases.
      Parameters:
      requestor - the Loader requesting a Value; must not be null
      absolutePath - an absolute Path; must not be null
      Returns:
      a deterministic Value whose Value.get() method returns the appropriate environment variable if the supplied absolutePath has a size of 2 (the root plus a single name) and there actually is a corresponding environment variable; null in all other cases
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if requestor or absolutePath is null
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic during the lifetime of a Java virtual machine instance.
      Nullability:
      This method may return null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
